name: Morning Stretch
description: Start your day with a 5-minute stretching routine.

name: Drink Water
description: Stay hydrated â€“ drink a glass of water.

name: Read a Book
description: Read for 30 minutes to expand your knowledge.

name: Summarize Your Notes
description: Review and summarize today's notes for better retention.

name: Write Daily Goals
description: Set your top 3 goals for the day to stay focused.

name: Declutter Workspace
description: Organize your desk for better focus and efficiency.

name: Meditate
description: Practice a 5-minute guided meditation to reduce stress.

name: Deep Work Session
description: Focus on a single task for 90 minutes without distractions.

name: Evening Reflection
description: Spend 10 minutes reflecting on your day and planning for tomorrow.

name: Physical Exercise
description: Engage in 30 minutes of any physical activity (jogging, yoga, etc.).

name: Plan Weekly Schedule
description: Outline your major tasks for the upcoming week.

name: Practice Gratitude
description: Write down 3 things you are grateful for today.

name: Study a New Language
description: Spend 20 minutes practicing a new language.

name: Declutter Digital Files
description: Organize files and clean up your digital workspace.

name: Set Long-Term Goals
description: Write down your long-term goals and action steps to achieve them.
